Burbank.California's 28th congressional district:
California's 28th congressional district is a congressional district in the U.S. state of California, in Los Angeles County. The district is currently represented by Democrat Adam Schiff.
The district includes Burbank, Glendale, the Verdugo Hills communities of Sunland and Tujunga, West Hollywood as well as parts of central Los Angeles including Hollywood Hills, Los Feliz, and Silver Lake.
